properties.address: Swingbridge Children's Centre, Grantham, Lincolnshire NG31 7XQ
properties.description: The centre has sessions for children aged 0-5 years and siblings up to 8 years during school holidays. Sessions are timetabled but the sensory room is always open and there is a pop in and play session on Fridays where you can just drop in and play without a planned session. We have a re-use re-love rail of children's clothes that are free to take.
properties.title: Lincolnshire county council
